## EnvUtil.getBooleanEnv() method

获取 Boolean 类型的环境变量，key 不存在返回 false

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getBooleanEnv(key: string): boolean;
```

| Parameter | Type   | Description |
| --------- | ------ | ----------- |
| key       | string | key         |

**Returns:**

boolean
